RTCPeerConnectionCreateDataChannel.summary:
The createDataChannel() method of the interface creates a new channel linked with the remote peer, over which any kind of data may be transmitted.
This can be useful for back-channel content, such as images, file transfer, text chat, game update packets, and so forth.

remarks.para: If the new data channel is the first one added to the connection, renegotiation is started by delivering a event.

RTCPeerConnectionCreateDataChannel.returns: A new object with the specified label, configured using the options specified by options if that parameter is included; otherwise, the defaults listed above are established.
